description:
A CHRISTIAN SINGLE GUIDE TO FINDING A CHRISTIAN HUSBAND IN 52 WEEKS OR LESS

Just imagine being able to marry a Christian man of your dreams in less than a year from now without using dating sites or spending a fortune on expensive match-making services.

Well this course covers nearly every bit of information you wanted to know about how to meet, treat and marry a Christian man, plus more... 

This vital information will be delivered using multi-media and easy to understand videos. 

You will also be give practical step-by-step instructions in downloadable manuals and podcasts to stick on your mobile device.
title: Christian Singles: A Definitive Guide To Getting Married
